name: Evicted
description:
You've just received an eviction notice. How much can you grab by yourself before you need to leave?

Presskit

Portfolio

Almost everyone knows the feeling of moving into a new home, whether it's a house, apartment or a dorm room. That feeling of a new beginning as you unpack your boxes. Unfortunately, that's not the case this time. You've been interrupted in the middle of unpacking and have found out that you have in fact been evicted. 

Being evicted isn't like escaping something or moving on, it's being told that you can no longer live in your home, figuring out where or how you'll be living and frantically removing all of your belongings. So how will you pack your life up and move on?

  • Controller support
  • Mac, Windows 10 and Windows 7+ support
  • Full 16:10, 16:9 and 21:9 aspect ratio support
  • Short play through, awarded for replays
  •  Windows Store and Xbox One store coming soon

Evicted is a project developed by Tiger Collins - with some help from other talented creatives.  I wanted to gamify an experience / art game, Evicted is what I came up with. 

The project had started in June 2018 but was initially dropped and picked up early 2019 and had been in development until May 2019. Development hours wise, it's been in development for approximately just over a month of full time work.

I never got a chance to work on what I wanted for my final project in my studies, in a way, this is the vertical slice project that I hope you enjoy!
